title: Borders, ca. 1780
medium: Block-printed on linen warp, cotton weft plain weave.
dimensions:
A. Warp: 84cm (33 in.). Weft: 25cm (10 3/4in.)
B. Warp: 79cm (37in.). Weft: 24.5cm (9 5/8in.)
description: Design of ovals and radiating fan shapes with guard stripes at each side. Two reds, mustard, blue, black and lavender.

tombstone.epitaph:
Borders, ca. 1780.
ca. 1780. Block-printed on linen warp, cotton weft plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-254-a,b.
